name: The Order of the Thorne - The King's Challenge
description: Be a Bard! The challenge awaits!!Join Finn the bard as he undertakes "The King's Challenge" and see if he has what it takes to not only survive, but to write the greatest song in all of the land of Uir!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 900 Mhz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: 1.2 GHZ Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound Card
